show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 0
synopsis: Capt. Pike is held prisoner and tested by aliens who have the power to project incredibly lifelike illusions.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 1
synopsis: Dr. McCoy discovers his old flame is not what she seems after crew members begin dying from a sudden lack of salt in their bodies.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 2
synopsis: Captain Kirk must learn the limits to the power of a 17-year-old boy with the psychic ability to create anything and destroy anyone.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 3
ep_title: Where No Man Has Gone Before
synopsis: The flight recorder of the 200-year-old U.S.S. Valiant relays a tale of terror--a magnetic storm at the edge of the galaxy!

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 4
synopsis: The crew is infected with a mysterious disease that removes people's emotional inhibitions to a dangerous degree.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 5
synopsis: A transporter malfunction splits Captain Kirk into two halves: one meek and indecisive, the other violent and ill tempered. The remaining crew members stranded on the planet cannot be beamed up to the ship until a problem is fixed.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 6
synopsis: The Enterprise picks up untrustworthy entrepreneur Harry Mudd accompanied by three beautiful women who immediately put a spell on all the male crew members.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 7
ep_title: What Are Little Girls Made Of?
synopsis: Nurse Chapel is reunited with her fianc√©; but his new obsession leads him to make an android duplicate of Captain Kirk.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 8
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a planet exactly like Earth, but the only inhabitants are children who contract a fatal disease upon entering puberty.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 9
synopsis: Kirk and psychiatrist Helen Noel are trapped on a maximum security penal colony that experiments with mind control and Spock must use the Vulcan mind-meld to find a way to save them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 10
synopsis: After the Enterprise is forced to destroy a dangerous marker buoy, a gigantic alien ship arrives to capture and condemn the crew as trespassers.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 11
synopsis: Spock kidnaps the crippled Capt. Pike, hijacks the Enterprise and then surrenders for court martial.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 12
synopsis: At Spock's court martial, he explains himself with mysterious footage about when Capt. Pike was kidnapped by powerful illusion casting aliens.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 13
synopsis: While Captain Kirk investigates whether an actor is actually a presumed dead mass murderer, a mysterious assailant is killing the people who could identify the fugitive.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 14
synopsis: The Enterprise must decide on its response when a Romulan ship makes a destructively hostile armed probe of Federation territory.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 15
synopsis: The past three months has left the crew of the Enterprise exhausted and in desperate need of a break, but does this explain McCoy's encounter with a human-sized white rabbit or Kirk crossing paths with the prankster who plagued his days at Starfleet Academy?

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 16
synopsis: The Galileo, under Spock's command, crash-lands on a hostile planet. As the Enterprise races against time to find the shuttlecraft, Spock's strictly logical leadership clashes with the fear and resentment of his crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 17
synopsis: A being that controls matter and creates planets wants to play with the Enterprise crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 18
synopsis: For bringing hostility into their solar system, a superior alien race brings Captain Kirk in mortal combat against the reptilian captain of an alien ship he was pursuing.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 19
synopsis: The Enterprise is thrown back in time to 1960s Earth.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 20
synopsis: Kirk draws a court martial in the negligent death of a crewman.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 21
synopsis: Seeking the answer to a century-old mystery, Kirk and crew encounter a vacantly peaceful society under a 6000-year autocratic rule that kills all those it can't absorb.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 22
synopsis: While on patrol in deep space, Captain Kirk and his crew find and revive a genetically engineered world conqueror and his compatriots from Earth's 20th century.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 23
synopsis: Kirk and Spock must save their ship's crew when they are declared all killed in action in a bizarre computer simulated war where the actual deaths must occur to continue.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 24
synopsis: The Enterprise investigates a planet whose colonists should be dead, but are not.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 25
synopsis: The Enterprise is sent to a mining colony that is being terrorized by a mysterious monster, only to find that the situation is not that simple.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 26
synopsis: With a war with Klingons raging, Kirk and Spock attempt to resist an occupation of a planet with incomprehensibly placid natives.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 27
synopsis: Existence itself comes under threat from a man's power-struggle with his alternate self, with the Enterprise's strained dilithium crystals presenting his key to a final solution.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 28
ep_title: The City on the Edge of Forever
synopsis: When a temporarily insane Dr. McCoy accidentally changes history and destroys his time, Kirk and Spock follow him to prevent the disaster, but the price to do so is high.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 1 - 29
synopsis: The Enterprise crew attempts to stop a plague of amoeba-like creatures from possessing human hosts and spreading throughout the galaxy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 1
synopsis: In the throes of his Pon Farr mating period, Spock must return to Vulcan to meet his intended future wife, betrothed from childhood.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 2
synopsis: A powerful being claiming to be the Greek god Apollo appears and demands that the crew of the Enterprise disembark onto his planet to worship him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 3
synopsis: A powerful artificially intelligent Earth probe, with a murderously twisted imperative, comes aboard the Enterprise and mistakes Capt. Kirk for its creator.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 4
synopsis: A transporter accident places Captain Kirk's landing party in an alternate universe, where the Enterprise is in the service of a barbarically brutal empire.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 5
synopsis: Primitive inhabitants of Gamma Trianguli VI worship a God who orders them to kill visitors, from the Enterprise.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 6
synopsis: The USS Enterprise encounters the wrecked USS Constellation and its distraught commodore who's determined to stop the giant planet-destroying robot ship that killed his crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 7
synopsis: Very alien visitors to our galaxy attempt to connect with human consciousness but miss, winding up tapping into the regions of human nightmares instead.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 8
synopsis: Harry Mudd returns with a plot to take over the Enterprise by stranding the crew on a planet populated by androids under his command.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 9
synopsis: While returning to the Enterprise aboard the shuttlecraft, Kirk, Spock, McCoy and a seriously ill Federation diplomat find themselves kidnapped by an energized cloud.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 10
synopsis: The Enterprise hosts a number of quarrelling diplomats, including Spock's father, but someone on board has murder in mind.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 11
synopsis: The Federation clashes with the Klingon Empire over mining rights to Capella IV. A sudden coup between its warrior-minded inhabitants forces Kirk's party to flee with the now dead leader's pregnant wife.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 12
synopsis: A landing party from the Enterprise is exposed to strange form of radiation which rapidly ages them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 13
synopsis: Capt. Kirk obsessively hunts for a mysterious cloud creature he encountered in his youth.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 14
synopsis: Kirk and the Enterprise Computer become detectives after Scotty is accused of murdering women on a pleasure planet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 15
synopsis: To protect a space station with a vital grain shipment, Kirk must deal with Federation bureaucrats, a Klingon battle cruiser and a peddler who sells furry, purring, hungry little creatures as pets.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 16
synopsis: Kirk, Uhura and Chekov are trapped on a planet where abducted aliens are enslaved and trained to perform as gladiators for the amusement of bored, faceless aliens.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 17
synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise struggles to cope with a planet of imitative people who have modeled their society on 1920s gangsters.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 18
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a gigantic energy draining space organism that threatens the galaxy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 19
synopsis: Peaceful, primitive peoples get caught up in the struggle between superpowers, with Kirk unhappily trying to restore the balance of power disrupted by the Klingons.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 20
synopsis: The Enterprise is guided to a distant, long-dead world where survivors of an extremely ancient race - existing only as disembodied energy - desiring the bodies of Kirk, Spock and astro-biologist Ann Mulhall so that they may live again.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 21
synopsis: Looking for a missing Federation cultural observer, Kirk and Spock find themselves on a planet whose culture has been completely patterned after Nazi Germany.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 22
synopsis: Galactic alien scouts capture the Enterprise for a return voyage and a prelude to invasion. Kirk's one advantage - they're not used to their adopted human form.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 23
synopsis: Responding to a distress signal, Kirk finds Captain Tracey of the U.S.S. Exeter violating the prime directive and interfering with a war between the Yangs and the Kohms to find the secret of their longevity.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 24
synopsis: Kirk and a sub-skeleton crew are ordered to test out an advanced artificially intelligent control system - the M-5 Multitronic system, which could potentially render them all redundant.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 25
synopsis: The Enterprise crew investigates the disappearance of a ship's crew on a planet that is a modern version of the Roman Empire.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 2 - 26
synopsis: While back in time observing Earth in 1968, the Enterprise crew encounters the mysterious Gary Seven who has his own agenda on the planet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 1
synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise pursues a mysterious woman who has abducted Spock's brain.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 2
synopsis: An apparently insane Capt. Kirk has the Enterprise deliberately enter the Romulan Neutral Zone where the ship is immediately captured by the enemy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 3
synopsis: Trapped on a planet whose inhabitants are descended from Northwestern Native Americans, Kirk loses his memory and is proclaimed a God while the crippled Enterprise races back to the planet before it is destroyed by an asteroid.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 4
synopsis: The Enterprise reaches a Federation colony where the adults have all killed themselves but the children play without care.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 5
ep_title: Is There in Truth No Beauty?
synopsis: Lovely telepath Miranda is aide to Ambassador Kollos, in a box to stop insanity when humans see Medusans. She rejects Larry, a designer of Enterprise, and senses murderous intent nearby.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 6
synopsis: As punishment for ignoring their warning and trespassing on their planet, the Melkot condemn Capt. Kirk and his landing party to the losing side of a surreal recreation of the 1881 historic gunfight at the OK Corral.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 7
synopsis: Both humans and Klingons have been lured to a planet by a formless entity that feeds on hatred and has set about to fashion them into a permanent food supply for itself.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 8
ep_title: For the World Is Hollow and I Have Touched the Sky
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers an apparent asteroid that is on a collision course with a planet is actually an ancient populated generation ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 9
synopsis: With Capt. Kirk and the derelict USS Defiant apparently lost, the Enterprise grapples with an insanity causing plague and an attack by the Tholians.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 10
synopsis: After Dr. McCoy helps the leader of a planet populated by people with powerful psionic abilities, they decide to force him to stay by torturing his comrades until he submits.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 11
synopsis: A group of aliens who exist in a state of incredible acceleration invade the Enterprise and abduct Capt. Kirk.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 12
synopsis: Trapped in an alien laboratory, Kirk, Spock and McCoy meet an empath and are involved in a series of experiments.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 13
synopsis: While transporting an arrogant, demanding princess for a political marriage, Captain Kirk must cope both with her biochemical ability to force him to love her and sabotage on his ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 14
synopsis: Kirk and Spock are taken prisoners by a former starship captain named Garth, who now resides at, and has taken over, a high security asylum for the criminally insane.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 15
ep_title: Let That Be Your Last Battlefield
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters two duo-chromatic and mutually belligerent aliens who put the ship in the middle of their old conflict.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 16
synopsis: Kirk beams down to the planet Gideon and appears to find himself trapped on a deserted Enterprise. Spock on the real Enterprise must use his diplomatic skills to deal with the uncooperative inhabitants of Gideon and find the Captain.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 17
synopsis: After the Enterprise landing party beams down to investigate a geologically interesting planet, their ship is hurled across the galaxy. Kirk and company find a deserted outpost guarded by the deadly image of a beautiful woman.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 18
synopsis: A mysterious, twinkling mass of sapient energy ravages an important archive and Scotty's new girlfriend may be linked to it.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 19
synopsis: On a planet, looking for an urgent medicinal cure, Kirk, Spock and McCoy come across a dignified recluse living privately but in splendor with his sheltered ward and a very protective robot servant.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 20
synopsis: A group of idealistic hippies, led by an irrational leader, come aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 21
synopsis: Kirk and Spock are caught up in a revolution on a planet where intellectuals and artists live on a utopian city in the sky while the rest of the population toils in mines on the barren surface below.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 22
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, Abraham Lincoln and Vulcan legend Surak are pitted in battle against notorious villains from history for the purpose of helping a conscious rock creature's understanding of a concept he does not understand, "good vs. evil".

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 23
synopsis: When Kirk, Spock and McCoy investigate the disappearance of a doomed planet's population, they find themselves trapped in different periods of that world's past.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Original Series - Season 3 - 24
synopsis: Captain Kirk's insane ex-lover Dr. Janice Lester forcibly switches bodies with him in order to take command of the Enterprise.
